des: "This is a wonderful alternative to regular eggnog.  It doesn't have a real strong cranberry taste.  It's very smooth tasting and has a pretty pink color!  I may have entered this too late for this holiday season, but it is well worth keeping for next holiday!"
ins: In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine cranberries and water. Bring to a boil and cook until the cranberries are mushy. Stir in sugar and nutmeg; remove from heat. Pour the eggnog into a blender along with the cranberry mixture and mix until well blended. Serve immediately.
